front.title: The Impact of Transport Header Encryption on Operation and Evolution of the Internet

abstract.t: This document describes the implications of applying end-to-end encryption at the transport layer. It identifies some in-network uses of transport layer header information that can be used with transport header authentication,. It reviews the implication of developing encrypted end-to-end transport protocols and examines the implication of developing and deploying encrypted end-to-end transport protocols.
